00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_PLATFORM_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_PLATFORM_H
00028 
00029 #define NOISEPP_PLATFORM_UNIX 1
00030 #define NOISEPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS 2
00031 
00032 #if defined(__WIN32__) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(WIN32) || defined(_WINDOWS)
00033 #       define NOISEPP_PLATFORM NOISEPP_PLATFORM_WINDOWS
00034 #else
00035 #       define NOISEPP_PLATFORM NOISEPP_PLATFORM_UNIX
00036 #endif
00037 
00038 #if defined(__GNUC__) && (__GNUC__ > 3 || __GNUC__ == 3 && __GNUC_MINOR__ > 0)
00039 #    define NOISEPP_INLINE __attribute__((always_inline)) inline
00040 #elif defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1200)
00041 #    define NOISEPP_INLINE __forceinline
00042 #else
00043 #    define NOISEPP_INLINE inline
00044 #endif
00045 
00046 #if defined(__GNUC__) || (defined(__MWERKS__) && (__MWERKS__ >= 0x3000)) || (defined(__ICC) && (__ICC >= 600))
00047 # define NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
00048 #elif defined(__FUNCSIG__)
00049 # define NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION __FUNCSIG__
00050 #elif (defined(__INTEL_COMPILER) && (__INTEL_COMPILER >= 600)) || (defined(__IBMCPP__) && (__IBMCPP__ >= 500))
00051 # define NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION __FUNCTION__
00052 #elif defined(__BORLANDC__) && (__BORLANDC__ >= 0x550)
00053 # define NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION __FUNC__
00054 #elif defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && (__STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901)
00055 # define NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION __func__
00056 #else
00057 # define NOISEPP_CURRENT_FUNCTION "(unknown)"
00058 #endif
00059 
00060 #endif
